snippet.title: ARMAGALLANT: DECKS OF DESTINY - ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER
snippet.description:
Discover the new RTS deckbuilding game, coming this April! In ArmaGallant: Decks of Destiny, players will strategically battle across varied maps, defending their monoliths and capturing enemy map points using a powerful collection of magical creatures and spells. Battles are fast-paced and deployed in real time. Go head-to-head or engage in 2v2 online play and private matches with friends!

For more information and to preorder, visit: www.maximumgames.com/armagallant
